text: Kate Calloway (born 1957) is an American author of crime fiction. Her stories feature a lesbian detective, Cassidy James. ==Works== * First Impressions, 1996 * Second Fiddle, 1997 * Third Degree, 1997 * Fourth Down, 1997 * Fifth Wheel, 1998 * Sixth Sense, 1999 * Seventh Heaven, 1999 * Eighth Day, 2001 ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American crime writers
title: Kate Calloway
